body_html: To make this bug report actionable it would be useful to have a small self-contained example. IE, perhaps a 1x1 convolution on a 1x1 input. There are unfortunately numerical difference between GPU and CPU kernels which are too hard to eliminate, but there may be specific cases where it is feasible.

body: To make this bug report actionable it would be useful to have a small self-contained example. IE, perhaps a 1x1 convolution on a 1x1 input. There are unfortunately numerical difference between GPU and CPU kernels which are too hard to eliminate, but there may be specific cases where it is feasible.
